elements.2211.03310_518ad990cdd2d4f088c898a5a89f2: We derive the nonlinear distortion matrix in the transformed differential equation in the Lie algebra and express the distortion matrix in a series form for any matrix Lie group and in a closed-form for the SE(2) Lie group

elements.2211.03310_09c2850ed1cea81392c39064fff23: mission safety of unmanned vehicle systems is challenging due to the presence of disturbances, such as wind, and model uncertainties due to variations between individual vehicles
elements.2211.03310_4f0a78ab8793ad6d27ad8dbb06ac3: Urban Air Mobility (UAM) is a motivating example, which is a concept for air transportation, including package delivery, weather monitoring, passenger transport, etc
elements.2211.03310_e2ca03977b788a8e0d9c3301b2558: The UAM system has various types of Unmanned Aerial Systems (UASs), such as fixed-wing aircraft and multirotors; therefore, the concurrent interaction of UASs is complicated in the UAM system
elements.2211.03310_1166fb1f845a4d6e500be17b576f6: Since the unmanned vehicle can be modeled as a hybrid system, a hybrid model checker can be used for Verification and Validation (V
elements.2211.03310_8bc3c5c4b12bbf70b75162cd69373: V) of safety and liveness properties for UASs in the UAM system
elements.2211.03310_c73addac842ca245699953b77ff80: Approximating the system as a Polyhedral Invariant Hybrid Automaton (PIHA) model is an efficient way to verify the system
elements.2211.03310_582e2d99ef43a048bb86a44fa885e: Constructing a PIHA model allows verification of universal Computation Tree Logic (CTL) specifications
elements.2211.03310_ada7417ce8ab6926a9eb50192b9cc: The CTL specification can be used for verifying the safety properties through reachability analysis
elements.2211.03310_3f94b72f89deeda4085e3af961256: To construct a PIHA model, barrier certificates are insufficient, since they can only ensure scalable and provably collision-free behavior
elements.2211.03310_f42b0959c626c68608ef9f77365e0: , and do not compute a flow pipe which is a collection of continuous-time trajectories starting from a set of initial states
elements.2211.03310_d0f39aa1707003eb80d527c1a1d0e: A flow pipe of the possible vehicle trajectories can be created using the reference trajectory and the invariant set of the error system, since an invariant set is a set that once a trajectory enters the trajectory cannot leave
elements.2211.03310_2281b148203d9f940e79a654bbaee: The creation of the PIHA model requires the construction of invariant sets around UAM reference trajectories
elements.2211.03310_84ae135b68c4d2444a147e9557251: Several methods exist to construct the invariant set for nonlinear systems
elements.2211.03310_d7703ee34feef035e059743f22513: One of the methods, FaSTrack in
elements.2211.03310_cdad7fba5fb4332cf90bbca592a17: , computes the Hamilton-Jacobi (HJ) reachability of the error dynamics between a tracking system and a planning system, which is a verification method for guaranteeing the performance and safety of systems
elements.2211.03310_61bc04107115c683ec25ef88718f1: The result from HJ reachability is used for computing backward reachable sets (BRSs)
elements.2211.03310_c36da535ff9df0ddd9d02410599eb: Since solving the HJ partial differential equations (PDEs) has a high computational complexity, the BRSs are computed offline
elements.2211.03310_1e21c080923db9a6c74300fbb37a1: If the control authority of the tracking system is powerful enough to successfully track the planning system, the result of the HJ PDEs will converge and there will exist a tracking error bound
elements.2211.03310_85baf5556487fff72be1fab6b9382: The tracking error bound is a reachable set in the relative error state; therefore, it can be thought of as a safety bubble around the reference trajectory that the vehicle is guaranteed to stay within, which can also be seen as the invariant set of the system in the error frame
elements.2211.03310_cf0e706c9fdea43efb7b4178838f6: The optimal control in HJ reachability is calculated using Pontryagin's maximum principle
elements.2211.03310_584982aa0631971789d0b144f2cec: Since the planner and tracker in HJ reachability are formulated as a pursuit-evasion game, the control of the planner is the worst-case scenario, which is considered as another disturbance during the computation that will lead to a larger tracking error bound compared to a known planner
elements.2211.03310_f6c04e7743765ae70df8e3ec783d5: This approach employs a hybrid safety controller, which is a combination of any performance controller and the safety controller, to stay within the tracking error bound under the worst-case planner and disturbance
elements.2211.03310_c5b968e53e15e008e5aad52d40dd0: The safety controller is a function/lookup table from the calculation of HJ reachability
elements.2211.03310_d5ca69630e1c382310fb4109b4c65: The HJ approach is independent of the performance controller used when the safety controller is not employed, which is advantageous for implementation on systems, requiring only the safety controller to be added
elements.2211.03310_d6a3b75c7f59c8af57453e0702022: However, the optimality of the control strategy with regard to input utilization is ignored in this approach

elements.2211.03310_8480c4ffd9a21acf93acc4dca0d06: In this paper, we presented a novel proof for the log-linearization of the error dynamics of mixed-invariant systems
elements.2211.03310_e02012c0cf796d77625fc996b7336: This proof yielded a new correct-by-construction control law based on dynamic inversion
elements.2211.03310_eb40743e75365c22b32911dfd4968: We developed an efficient method to compute the invariant sets for the error dynamics of mixed-invariant systems using our invariant control law with bounded disturbances
elements.2211.03310_cc038f8f88f82d1e6026636d38249: Our method is based on log-linearization in the Lie group and Linear Matrix Inequalities (LMIs) for a polytopic system with bounded inputs
elements.2211.03310_049be3d472ac50db69858b8f9047d: Our simulation demonstrated the application of our algorithm to safety verification in an Urban Air Mobility (UAM) scenario
elements.2211.03310_aadc3b37d7baf6f81ce5a4e9166bf: In the simulation, we also compared the LMI approach against an existing reachability analysis method and showed that LMI approach is efficient
elements.2211.03310_ee9e96e635c76ccd3365ced370333: The simulation of a rover with nonholonomic constraints proved that our algorithm can be applied to the underactuated vehicle where full control in the Lie algebra is not possible
elements.2211.03310_32121465901824271c8945c2eab42: As future work, we intend to apply our approach to three-dimensional trajectory planning by employing the SE(3) Lie group and extending our approach to more complex aircraft dynamic models.
elements.2211.03310_3760aad5cac138dfcf97aa866a386: In this paper, we use the derivative of the exponential map to derive the exact evolution of the logarithm of the tracking error for mixed-invariant systems, a class of systems capable of describing rigid body tracking problems in Lie groups
elements.2211.03310_acb054d381830aecef81982d29ef2: Additionally, we design a log-linear dynamic inversion-based control law to remove the nonlinearities due to spatial curvature and enhance the robustness of the controller
elements.2211.03310_08eab7d74e446eca6e944c9315065: We apply Linear Matrix Inequalities (LMIs) to bound the tracking error given a bounded disturbance amplified by the distortion matrix and leverage the tracking error bound to create flow pipes
elements.2211.03310_40e0cc6738240589e6df205c45cd0: To demonstrate the usefulness of our method, we show its application with Urban Air Mobility (UAM) scenarios using a simplified kinematic aircraft model and polynomial-based path planning methods.
elements.2211.03310_6420425715dfde47b9be2fa955a04: Lie Group Theory, Mixed-Invariant Systems, Log-Linearization, Dynamic Inversion Control, Safety Verification
elements.2211.03310_990e86410dc74dd6dcf6a3512093d: the safety of an Unmanned Aerial System (UAS) in urban environments is a challenging task as a UAS operates in a dynamic environment subject to unknown uncertainties, such as wind, etc.
elements.2211.03310_1c4b1f4de5e7a4cf9ccf4c7e582d6: One of the approaches to ensure the safety of a dynamical system is to construct an invariant set of system trajectories in the presence of unknown disturbances
elements.2211.03310_47c6ef58ab40ca6af10b91454c7d6: An invariant set represents the set of trajectories in which the system remains if it starts within or enters the set
elements.2211.03310_821cc4eee7d97d040c04e3e560fcb: This notion of set invariance provides a powerful tool to analyze the worst-case impact of the unknown disturbance on the system
elements.2211.03310_77fea1fef1d29f886cc8731f54172: For constructing invariant sets, the existing methods in the literature either use a grid-based
elements.2211.03310_0609720fa71a1ffdc684c0dd9018c: One of the recent methods in the grid-based approach is FaStrack
elements.2211.03310_935aff3fb9b32599b9782fa8e58da: , where the Hamilton-Jacobi (HJ) reachability of the error dynamics between a tracking system and a planning system is computed
elements.2211.03310_a864783bd2e84069d1feea0cc2c98: The authors have successfully demonstrated that when the control authority is powerful, the tracking error is bounded, and the HJ partial differential equations (PDEs) converge
elements.2211.03310_9b90ee483b6cd42a218972db02e18: Another popular method for constructing invariant sets of nonlinear systems is using a Lyapunov function
elements.2211.03310_47219466a61eeafc0eded85d8391f: A Lyapunov function can be found either by hand or using a Lyapunov-based control design methodology, such as backstepping control
elements.2211.03310_999d99429a4b013bc140b7b4aa9c3: While the HJ reachability approach can compute the invariant set for a nonlinear system, it is computationally expensive
elements.2211.03310_d7c93533235de521675fd156b6569: Similarly, Lyapunov-based approaches for non-linear systems can be tedious and difficult to generalize
elements.2211.03310_b75e0cffa08f8f9e9783d6951d2bd: In this work, we utilize Linear Matrix Inequalities (LMIs)
elements.2211.03310_3c1ed5ad10a266506070f7c535b84: to efficiently compute the invariant set of the linearized error dynamics of the nonlinear tracking system.
elements.2211.03310_874c06fd404363450c4a7193e6d01: For a class of nonlinear systems, group affine systems
elements.2211.03310_3e994e03bc67b73c270937fdda6f0: , whose states can be represented using Lie Groups, a unique property, the log-linear property, can be employed to convert the nonlinear structure of the Lie Group into a linear form in the Lie algebra
elements.2211.03310_147c74401c00e8ae77229b7370d10: Modeling the states of the nonlinear system as a member of a Lie group has been successfully applied in various applications such as state estimation
elements.2211.03310_d9f03a258f8dca7a07e162b9dada1: In the Lie algebra, a group affine system
elements.2211.03310_d5e133a78f49305dbc81086187312: behaves linearly despite nonlinearities in the original system on the Lie group, such as those arising from rigid body rotation
elements.2211.03310_7eeb8659cb52e40c11001e121ede1: The Lie algebra provides a convenient coordinate system using the log-linear property for the log-linearization of error dynamics, where the number of coordinates is equal to the degrees of freedom of the dynamical system
elements.2211.03310_32be1925feb256c88cf49fff4ee36: However, the log-linear property of the error dynamics governing the deviation of a system from its reference trajectory does not hold in the presence of feedback control, disturbance, and noise, which can cause nonlinearities in the Lie algebra dynamical system
elements.2211.03310_076dc1130193cb86be5a11598c40e: These nonlinearities are often neglected in existing work on log-linearized systems
elements.2211.03310_d3deac14725ce796eb7fde9f030a3: As a result, the exact solution is not provided, and thus the computed invariant set of the nonlinear dynamics is over-approximated
elements.2211.03310_f097279e7d39c43cde960b674a543: This paper presents a generalized method for deriving the exact evolution of the log-linearization of the error dynamics for mixed-invariant systems, as defined in
elements.2211.03310_022ac1ca394fb7eb658e3394b71a0: , in Lie groups using the derivative of the exponential map
elements.2211.03310_e38e63c60f50367e15a2bcb350ded: While a similar method is mentioned in
elements.2211.03310_2c368c4c6fdd42fdf6d14d31e1c6f: , where they derive the log-linearization without approximation for a specific Lie group,
elements.2211.03310_8a3ac27cc263af91d99bd76673321: , our work was developed independently, we provide the exact log-linearization approach applicable to any Lie group, making our method more generic
elements.2211.03310_af72604ba02b93b48d419f6fb1da0: Additionally, to enhance the control robustness, we propose a log-linear dynamic inversion-based control law
